com.ontotext.jape.pda

Class SimpleSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ontotext.jape.pda.SimpleSet

  • public class SimpleSet
extends Object
    This class stores an index of annotations. The index provides the following functionalities: 1. Given i, for worst case constant time extracts the list of all annotations with start node having offset i. 2. Given j, for worst case constant time finds the smallest i >= j such that there is an annotation with start node having offset i. The time complexity to build the index is O(the length of the document).

        public SimpleSet(int documentLength)

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public ArrayList<gate.Annotation> get(int startOffset)
        the get method retrieves a list of all annotations with start node having offset startOffset
        Parameters:
        startOffset - the offset to which the list should be retrieved.
        Returns:
        the list of all annotations with start node having offset elValue or null if there is no annotation with start node having offset elValue

      • add

        public void add(gate.Annotation annot)
        Adds annotation.
        Parameters:
        annot - the annotation to be added

      • finish

        public void finish()
        Precomputes the index to be used by the firstStartAfter method. This method must be called when there are no more annotations to be added.

      • firstStartOffsetAfter

        public int firstStartOffsetAfter(int offset)
        If endOffset is the offset of the end node of some annotation, for worst case constant time returns the smallest i >= endOffset such that there is an annotation with start node having offset i. Returns -1 if no annotation starts after endOffset. If endOffset is 0, returns the smallest i such that there is an annotation with start node having offset i.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        true if there is no annotation added

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        the number of distinct start offsets
